objc-avoid-nserror-init.description:
Description

Finds improper initialization of
NSError
objects.

According to Apple developer document, we should always use factory method
errorWithDomain:code:userInfo:
to create new NSError objects instead
of
[NSError
alloc]
init]
. Otherwise it will lead to a warning message
during runtime.

The corresponding information about
NSError
creation:
https://developer.apple.com/library/content/documentation/Cocoa/Conceptual/ErrorHandlingCocoa/CreateCustomizeNSError/CreateCustomizeNSError.html
objc-avoid-nserror-init.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
